title: Football is back ... in case you have not heard
itunes:title: Football is back ... in case you have not heard
description:
That's right, football is back and the fellas could not be more thrilled about it's return. And you notice that nobody ever threatened to walk away from the NFL like the fans of other sports do during a labor strife. And you want to know why? Football is king, that's why. That is why today's show is chalk full of football talk. Who are the front runners for the Super Bowl? What coach is setting himself up for failure? And is Adam Rank's weight balloon beyond healthy levels? All of that in more in this thin slice of heaven we like to call, The Dave Dameshek GRIDIRON Program. (Or football for now.)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
